participant_1.background:
I once got to meet a real unicorn in the forest near my house.
its cold where i live.
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
i was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
i like to cook new recipes.

participant_2.background:
I drive a hybrid car because I want to save the environment for my cats.
my wife and i enjoy long sunday drives.
i work from home.
I enjoy wearing my cat-eye glasses while training to compete in the Olympics.
I'd love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.

content.text: Hey there how are you doing?
Good thanks! I'm getting ready to take my wife and kids to the ballet in air conditioning.
That's so cool! I love the ballet! I was a navy brat so I had to move around a lot and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
Wow, that is a lot of schools! I'm glad you like the ballet. My wife and I enjoy long Sunday drives.
That sounds like fun! I love driving, but I don't have a car right now. I've been trying to save up for a hybrid.
That's a great idea! I drive a hybrid car because I want to save the environment for my cats.
That's so sweet of you! I love cats. I once met a real unicorn in the forest near my house.
Wow, that's amazing! I've never seen a unicorn.
I know, right? It was so magical. I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
That's so cute! I love dogs. I have a cat and a dog.
Me too! I love animals. I like to cook new recipes. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to cook too! I also enjoy wearing my cat-eye glasses while training to compete in the Olympics.
That's so cool! I've never been to the Olympics. I work from home as a software engineer.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to work from home. I'm a teacher.
That's a great job! I'm glad you enjoy it.
Nice talking to you! Have a great time at the ballet!
